name: Space Resort: Left Behind
description:
Astronaut Al's Interstellar resort is supposed to be a place of joy and fun! Unfortunately, Al didn't check the planet he decided to build his resort on for any alien life forms. The monsters dug up through the resort's pool and started attacking his esteemed guests. Thankfully the brave Al had everyone successfully evacuated...well everyone except you.

Can you escape this vacation turned nightmare?
